payload:
# Implementation Plan (Micro-TDD) â€” Language Core v0

Convert the design into a series of implementation steps that build each component in a test-driven, incremental way. Each step below ends in a working, demoable increment and integrates with prior steps.

## Progress Checklist

- [ ] Step 1: Bootstrap workspace + acceptance backpressure harness + BDD foundation
- [ ] Step 2: Lexer for Elixir-inspired token set
- [ ] Step 3: Parser for modules/functions and core expressions
- [ ] Step 4: Pa... [truncated, 15399 chars total]

payload.summary: Step 1 task queue prepared; begin with RED CLI --help smoke test

payload: task-1771622367-847f done: added RED CLI --help smoke test and verified expected failure via cargo test --test cli_help_smoke
task-1771622367-912c done: implemented tonic command skeleton (run/check/test/fmt/cache/verify + verify run mode parsing), stable exit codes, cargo test + fmt check pass
task-1771622367-9b3c done: added verify_missing_acceptance red test; cargo test --test verify_missing_acceptance fails as expected (unexpected success code=0).

payload.summary: implemented acceptance YAML loader with explicit missing-file diagnostic
payload.verification: cargo test --test verify_missing_acceptance; cargo test; cargo fmt --all -- --check

payload.verification: cargo test --test verify_feature_parser (fails as expected); cargo fmt --all -- --check

payload.verification: cargo test --test verify_feature_parser; cargo test; cargo fmt --all -- --check

payload.verification: cargo test; cargo fmt --all -- --check
